attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need a champion with real power to bring in line all those such as the banks, councils, insurance company's and the energy company's who are all preying on us while we struggle with our diminishing salary's, the current consumer services don't have "any teeth".  
  But they must not have come from one of the sectors we are fighting against, as is the case now.
